diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Echocardiographic examination revealed limited mobility of mitral valve leaflets, the shape of the leaflets resembling the 'Î©' symbol, all chordae inserted into the posteromedial papillary muscle (PM), and the presence of coarctation of the aorta (CoA) with evidence of a small left ventricle. Autopsy confirmed the findings, noting all chordae connected to an elongated posteromedial PM with narrowing at the mitral valve opening.
